mapper.insert: insert into r_match_result (uuid, is_del, creater, updater, create_time, update_time, match_type, match_result, muti_amount, remark, match_status) values (#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{matchType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{matchResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mutiAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matchStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select uuid, is_del, creater, updater, create_time, update_time, match_type, match_result, muti_amount, remark, match_status from r_match_result
